name: iXplorer: Last hope
description:
Made For Trijam 160 .

The loading is a bit long Sorry!

Made in 6 hours

your spaceship has broken down in the middle of an asteroid field, you have to collect asteroids to repair or mintain the needs of the spaceship, if the needs reach 0, the reactor burns out and it's death. so don't let it turns off !

How To Play

1 . Hold left click to move forward

2 . Use mouse to rotate

3 . Use the right click to attach to or detach from an asteroid
